long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
FocusTube: Stay Focused on What Matters

Tired of getting distracted by endless YouTube recommendations, comments, or other irrelevant content? FocusTube is here to help! This productivity extension helps you stay focused by cleaning up YouTube’s cluttered interface. Whether you’re working, studying, or simply trying to watch a video without distractions, FocusTube lets you control what you see.

Key Features:
* Remove Distractions: Hide recommendations, comments, and other distracting elements.
* Customizable Settings: Choose which elements to keep and which to hide.
* Automatic Application: Your settings are automatically applied each time you visit YouTube.
* Easy to Use: Toggle options directly from the extension popup for quick customization.
* FocusTube ensures that your YouTube experience is clean and focused, helping you stay productive and enjoy the content that matters most. Install FocusTube today and take control of your YouTube browsing!
